parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query: Resources | where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces" | order by name | project id, name, selected=row_number()==1, group=resourceGroup

content.json:
### Help file

Cisco Firepower by Clive Watson - Quorum Cyber.

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: ðŸ“Š Data flow over Time - TimeBrush enabled.  You can click within this chart and select a subset of the data.  TimeRange selected: {TimeRange:label} with Automatic Time Grain of: {TimeRange:grain}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize count() by DeviceAction
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count by Actions

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize count() by Protocol
| order by Protocol asc, count_ desc
content.title: Count by Protocols

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize count() by DeviceName
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count by DeviceName

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where isnotempty(DeviceEventClassID)  
| extend ThreatId = coalesce(
                            column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                            extract('cat=([^;]+)',1,AdditionalExtensions),
                            ""
                        )
| where isnotempty(ThreatId)
| summarize Amount=count() by ThreatId, LogSeverity
| order by LogSeverity desc
content.title: Count by Threats

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize count() by ApplicationProtocol
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count by Application Protocol

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize count() by  DeviceEventClassID
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count by EventClass

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where isnotempty(DeviceEventClassID)  
| extend ThreatId = coalesce(
                            column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory", ""),
                            extract('cat=([^;]+)',1,AdditionalExtensions),
                            ""
                        )
| where isnotempty(ThreatId)
| where AdditionalExtensions !contains "Not"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ThreatId
content.title: Lastest Threats by ThreatId, {$rowCount}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where DeviceAction has "Block"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by DeviceName, SourceIP
content.title: Blocks by Device, {$rowCount} - Click to check IOC status

content.query:
ThreatIntelIndicatorsv2
| where TimeGenerated > ago(180d)
| where NetworkIP == '{IPAddress}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Active) by IndicatorId, SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType
| project SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType, Active
content.title: IP Threat Intelligence
content.noDataMessage: No Threat Intelligence was found for the selected IP.

content.query:
let starttime = 14d;
  let endtime = 1d;
  let timeframe = 1h;
  let scorethreshold = 5;
  let percentotalthreshold = 50;
  let TimeSeriesData = CommonSecurityLog
  | where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
  | where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
  | where isnotempty(DestinationIP) and isnotempty(SourceIP)
  | where TimeGenerated between (startofday(ago(starttime))..startofday(ago(endtime)))
  | project TimeGenerated,SourceIP, DestinationIP, DeviceVendor
  | make-series Total=count() on TimeGenerated from startofday(ago(starttime)) to startofday(ago(endtime)) step timeframe by DeviceVendor;
  // Filtering specific records associated with spikes as outliers
  let TimeSeriesAlerts=materialize(TimeSeriesData
  | extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(Total, scorethreshold, -1, 'linefit')
  | mv-expand Total to typeof(double), TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), anomalies to typeof(double),score to typeof(double), baseline to typeof(long)
  | where anomalies > 0 | extend score = round(score,2), AnomalyHour = TimeGenerated
  | project DeviceVendor,AnomalyHour, TimeGenerated, Total, baseline, anomalies, score);
  let AnomalyHours = materialize(TimeSeriesAlerts  | where TimeGenerated > ago(2d) | project TimeGenerated);
  // Join anomalies with Base Data to popalate associated records for investigation - Results sorted by score in descending order
  TimeSeriesAlerts
  | where TimeGenerated > ago(2d)
  | join (
      CommonSecurityLog
  | where isnotempty(DestinationIP) and isnotempty(SourceIP)
  | where TimeGenerated > ago(2d)
  | extend DateHour = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h) // create a new column and round to hour
  | where DateHour in ((AnomalyHours)) //filter the dataset to only selected anomaly hours
  | summarize HourlyCount = count(), TimeGeneratedMax = arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), DestinationIPlist = make_set(DestinationIP, 100), DestinationPortlist = make_set(DestinationPort, 100) by DeviceVendor, SourceIP, TimeGeneratedHour= bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
  | extend AnomalyHour = TimeGeneratedHour
  ) on AnomalyHour, DeviceVendor
  | extend PercentTotal = round((HourlyCount / Total) * 100, 3)
  | where PercentTotal > percentotalthreshold
  | project DeviceVendor , AnomalyHour, TimeGeneratedMax, SourceIP, DestinationIPlist, DestinationPortlist, HourlyCount, PercentTotal, Total, baseline, score, anomalies
  | summarize HourlyCount=sum(HourlyCount), StartTimeUtc=min(TimeGeneratedMax), EndTimeUtc=max(TimeGeneratedMax), SourceIPlist = make_set(SourceIP, 100), SourceIPMax= arg_max(SourceIP, *), DestinationIPlist = make_set(DestinationIPlist, 100), DestinationPortlist = make_set(DestinationPortlist, 100) by DeviceVendor , AnomalyHour, Total, baseline, score, anomalies
  | project DeviceVendor , AnomalyHour, EndTimeUtc, SourceIPMax ,SourceIPlist, DestinationIPlist, DestinationPortlist, HourlyCount, Total, baseline, score, anomalies
  | extend timestamp= EndTimeUtc , IPCustomEntity = SourceIPMax
content.title: Time series anomaly detection for total volume of traffic, {$rowCount}

parameters.name: ComputerList
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
//| where DeviceAction has "Block"
| summarize  by Computer
| order by Computer asc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct == "Firepower" 
| where Activity == "File Malware Event"
| where '{ComputerList}' == DeviceAction or '{ComputerList:label}' == "<unset>"
content.title: File Malware Events, {$rowCount}

parameters.name: DeviceAction
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
//| where DeviceAction has "Block"
| where DestinationPort == "80"
| summarize  by DeviceAction
| order by DeviceAction asc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct == "Firepower" 
| where DestinationPort == "80"
| where '{DeviceAction}' == DeviceAction or '{DeviceAction:label}' == "<unset>"
content.title: Outbound Web Traffic Port 80, {$rowCount}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct == "Firepower"
| extend bytesOut = extract('bytesOut=([^;]+)',1,AdditionalExtensions)
| summarize by bytesOut, Computer,  RequestURL, SourceUserName , SourceIP, SourceHostName, DestinationIP, DestinationPort
| top 20 by bytesOut
| order by bytesOut desc
content.title: Top 20 sending URLs (bytes Sent Out)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct == "Firepower" 
| summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)| project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d), LastLogReceived, minsSinceLastLog = datetime_diff('minute',LastLogReceived, now())
content.title: IsConnected

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where _IsBillable = true
| make-series billedData = sum(_BilledSize) on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to now() step 1d  by Type
content.title: Data Ingested during  {TimeRange:label}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIP)
| summarize count() by MaliciousIP , MaliciousIPCountry, MaliciousIPLatitude, MaliciousIPLongitude,SourceIP, DestinationIP, DeviceName, IndicatorThreatType, ThreatConfidence, ReportReferenceLink
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Count by Malicious IP

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where isnotempty(MaliciousIP)
| summarize count() by MaliciousIP , MaliciousIPCountry, MaliciousIPLatitude, MaliciousIPLongitude
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Malicious IP by Country

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where DeviceAction contains "Block"
| summarize Total = count() by SourceIP, Computer
| top 10 by Total
//| summarize count() by DeviceAction
content.title: Top 10 Blocked inbound IPs

parameters.name: DeviceAction
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceAction
| order by Count desc
| project Value = DeviceAction, Label = strcat(DeviceAction, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: SourceIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where (DeviceAction in ({DeviceAction}) or '{DeviceAction:label}' == "All")
| where isnotempty(DestinationIP) 
| summarize Count = count() by SourceIP
| order by Count desc
| project Value = SourceIP, Label = strcat(SourceIP, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: SourcePort
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where (DeviceAction in ({DeviceAction}) or '{DeviceAction:label}' == "All")
| summarize Count = count() by SourcePort
| order by Count desc
| project Value = SourcePort, Label = strcat(SourcePort, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: DestinationIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where (DeviceAction in ({DeviceAction}) or '{DeviceAction:label}' == "All")
| where isnotempty(DestinationIP) 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationIP
| order by Count desc
| project Value = DestinationIP, Label = strcat(DestinationIP, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: DestinationPort
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where (DeviceAction in ({DeviceAction}) or '{DeviceAction:label}' == "All")
| where isnotempty(DestinationPort) 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationPort
| order by Count desc
| project Value = DestinationPort, Label = strcat(DestinationPort, " count: ", Count)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ "Cisco"
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'Firepower'
| where (SourceIP in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") 
    and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") 
    and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") 
    and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
    and (DeviceAction in ({DeviceAction}) or '{DeviceAction:label}' == "All")
content.title: Filtered View, count:  {$rowCount}
